name: Gang Nations
description:
Gang Nations is a stunning blend of tower defence and combat strategy set in a unique urban environment. Recruit a gang of Hoodlums, Thieves, Convicts and many more to rage a turf war around the globe, fight for territory and build your criminal empire. Gang Nations is a fantastic mix of exciting single-player missions and ferocious multiplayer battles, combining city building with fierce combat. Become the Boss of the neighborhood!

** This game is compatible with devices on iOS 6.0 and above. Play across all supported devices – iPhone 4S, iPhone 5, iPhone 5C, iPhone 5S, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 plus, iPad 2, iPad 3, iPad 4, iPad Mini and iPod 5. **

REVIEWS:

5/5 "AMAZING!"

Gang Nations features and gameplay:
• FREE TO PLAY
• Build an amazing urban city and make it impenetrable to enemy attacks.
• Battle other online players to increase your reputation.
• Create your own gang with other online players and friends.
• 10 unique troops with several upgrades and abilities to master.
• Fight your way through a thrilling criminal underworld campaign.
• Login with Facebook to save your city progress.
• Amazing high resolution graphics.
• Gang wars - coming soon.

Please note that Gang Nations is completely free to play, but some items such as gems can be purchased for real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, you can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

Note: A network connection is required to play.

Privacy Policy: www.playdemic.com/privacy_policy.php

Support: http://playdemic.helpshift.com/a/gang-nations/?p=ios
